string-array.name: par
string-array.item: 2 - 10 to 60 minutes per week of modest physical activity
3 - Over 60 minutes per week of modest physical activity
4 - Less than 30 minutes of heavy physical activity per week
5 - 30 to 60 minutes of heavy physical activity per week
6 - 1 to 3 hours of heavy physical activity per week
7 - Over 3 hours of heavy physical activity per week
